/* 1970s: Paul McCartney (solo) and Wings */ put album cover in
/* Relationship with Jane Asher */ Put Asher photo in
Better like this. This is not the article on George Martin, so his contributions are not notable here.
/* Song samples */ Martin's contributions are not "footnote" contributions for these 3; they are at least as important as Mc's.
/* Song samples */ More definite: the songs are not "widely considered to be" primarily composed by McCartney; he and Lennon agreed about this, with only a few disputes about who wrote what
/* Song samples */ More accurate wording with redundant titles removed. (No need to list them twice.)
/* Song samples */ "Michelle" is about 50% Lennon. There is also a problem with terminology here. All theses are officially ATTRIBUTED to Lennon-McCartney--as are Lennon's solo Beatles works.
/* Song samples */ Previous sentence gave impression that he was predominant Beatle writer.
/* 2000s */ Removed "diary" entries of what seem to me to be non-notable apperances
Fixed some awkward writing re: Harrigan
